sys_ux_client_script.name: createRecord

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_ab2c353497543110abc2b3b6f053af92
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="New asset modal">d32c353497543110abc2b3b6f053af6c</macroponent><name>createRecord</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var selectedOption = api.state.selectedOption;
    var query = api.context.props.query;
    if(typeof(query) !== 'undefined' && query.indexOf('sys_class_name=alm_asset') !== -1) {
        query = query.replace('sys_class_name=alm_asset','');
    }
    var routes = {"route": "record","redirect": "true","fields": {"table": selectedOption,"sysId": "-1"},"params":{"query": query}};
        if (selectedOption === 'hardware') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_hardware';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'consumable') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_consumable';
                route(api,routes);
        }
         else if (selectedOption === 'license') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_license';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'bundle') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_bundle';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'facility') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_facility';
                route(api,routes);
        }
        else if (selectedOption === 'pallet') {
                routes.fields.table = 'alm_pallet';
                route(api,routes);
        }

    function route(api, params) {
        helpers.modal.close();
        api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', params);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-25 11:30:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>ab2c353497543110abc2b3b6f053af92</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>createRecord</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ab2c353497543110abc2b3b6f053af92</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-25 11:30:13</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
